title: GotoBrinno
body:
Press put concoction on statue button (limes)


"Soldier! The beast slayed so many of our army. 

Give sword button

"I attacked it with my sword but it was futile.

His scales are as hard as diamond.
His eyes are made of fire. 

His breath is putrid and will make you faint on the spot. 

Be brave soldier. A death in battle is a noble death."



[[ Run for your life- End game now |Endgamenow]] [[  A death in battle is a noble death- Continue playing|OracleAppears]] 

Brinno's character sheet appears
